Career:

Ulla has more than 20 years experience working with innovation and business development. She has worked for McKinsey & Company and the media groups Egmont and Nordisk Film where she was instrumental in the establishment of IO Interactiveâ€”the leading games development company in Denmarkâ€”and she managed the corporate venture activity Egmont Imagination. She subsequently founded HABURI.com, an online factory outlet. Over the years, Ulla has been involved in several start-up companies as an advisor or as an investor. She holds an MBA from Columbia University.
